title: Question 25
prompt: A U.S. company is researching whether to label their products as made from recycled materials. The company decides that the information in this chart does not directly support the conclusion that labeling their recycled products will necessarily increase sales. What might be a reasonable argument for the company’s conclusion?
description: Click the  <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback: The survey asks whether consumers avoid socially or environmentally unsound products or otherwise punish socially or environmentally unsound companies. A company that is considering labeling its products as made with recycled materials in order to increase sales wants to know whether consumers will be more likely to buy environmentally sound materials. The question that the survey asks does not directly relate to the company’s decision.
